name: MEMEGEON
description:
You are stuck in a freaking dungeon (I guess) and it has memes (probably) explore a kinda random generated map, fight creatures of good and bad, collect loot, fight bosses, and play with friends. 

(This version of MEMEGEON is the very first version so expect a lot of crap, and stay tuned for updates. This game is submitted to MEME THEME GAMES. there is no quit button yet.)
